Class UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
Core.ActiveActor
Core.ActiveActorDestructible
Core.FighterPlane
Entities.UserPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends FighterPlane
Represents the user's controllable plane in the game. The UserPlane can move in all directions, fire projectiles, and take damage.

  • Property Summary

    Properties inherited from class javafx.scene.image.ImageView

    • IMAGE_NAME

      private static final String IMAGE_NAME
      The name of the image used to represent the user's plane.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • Y_UPPER_BOUND

      private static final double Y_UPPER_BOUND
      The upper bound for the user's vertical position. This prevents the plane from moving too high on the screen.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • Y_LOWER_BOUND

      private static final double Y_LOWER_BOUND
      The lower bound for the user's vertical position. This prevents the plane from moving too low on the screen.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • X_LEFT_BOUND

      private static final double X_LEFT_BOUND
      The left bound for the user's horizontal position. This prevents the plane from moving too far to the left.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • X_RIGHT_BOUND

      private static final double X_RIGHT_BOUND
      The right bound for the user's horizontal position. This prevents the plane from moving too far to the right.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      private static final int PROJECTILE_Y_POSITION_OFFSET
      The vertical offset for positioning the projectile fired by the user's plane.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • verticalVelocityMultiplier

      private int verticalVelocityMultiplier
      A multiplier for adjusting the vertical velocity of the user's plane. This can be used for accelerating or decelerating movement vertically.

    • horizontalVelocityMultiplier

      private int horizontalVelocityMultiplier
      A multiplier for adjusting the horizontal velocity of the user's plane. This can be used for accelerating or decelerating movement horizontally.

    • numberOfKills

      private int numberOfKills
      Tracks the number of enemies destroyed by the user's plane.

    • health

      private int health
      The current health of the user's plane. This decreases as the plane takes damage.

    • root

      private final javafx.scene.Group root
      The root group where visual elements associated with the user's plane are added.

  • Constructor Details

      Constructs a UserPlane with specified initial health and root group.

      initialHealth - the initial health of the UserPlane.
      root - the root group for adding visual elements.

      public UserPlane(int initialHealth)
      Constructs a UserPlane with specified initial health and no root group.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the UserPlane based on its velocity multipliers. Ensures that the plane stays within defined boundaries.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the state of the UserPlane, including its position.
      Overrides:
      updateActor in class FighterPlane

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile from the UserPlane's current position.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      the newly created projectile.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Decreases the UserPlane's health by one. If health reaches zero, the plane is destroyed.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane

    • incrementHealth

      public void incrementHealth()
      Increases the UserPlane's health by one.

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Gets the current health of the UserPlane.
      Overrides:
      getHealth in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      the current health.

    • isMoving

      public boolean isMoving()
      Checks if the UserPlane is currently moving.
      Returns:
      true if moving, false otherwise.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Starts upward movement by setting the vertical velocity multiplier to -1.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Starts downward movement by setting the vertical velocity multiplier to 1.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Starts leftward movement by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to -1.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Starts rightward movement by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to 1.

    • stopVertical

      public void stopVertical()
      Stops vertical movement by setting the vertical velocity multiplier to 0.

    • stopHorizontal

      public void stopHorizontal()
      Stops horizontal movement by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to 0.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops all movement by resetting both vertical and horizontal velocity multipliers to 0.

    • getNumberOfKills

      public int getNumberOfKills()
      Gets the number of kills achieved by the UserPlane.
      Returns:
      the number of kills.

    • incrementKillCount

      public void incrementKillCount()
      Increments the kill count for the UserPlane.
